sentences.en: Credulous are easily misled by false advertisements.
sentences.cn: 轻信的人容易上假广告的当.

sentences.en: Credulous attitude will only make you take anything for granted.
sentences.cn: 轻信的态度只会使你想当然.

sentences.en: He has suffered several times because he is credulous.
sentences.cn: 他太轻信,吃了好几次苦头.

sentences.en: It was a world of good little people, comfortable , industrious , credulous.
sentences.cn: 住在这里的是些善良的小人物, 舒适,勤恳, 自信.

sentences.en: Mary is so credulous that she may readily accept any excuse you make.
sentences.cn: 玛丽很轻信,你随便找个借口她都可以相信.

sentences.en: Only a credulous person would believe your story.
sentences.cn: 只有轻信的人才会相信你的故事.

sentences.en: Only a credulous person would fall for that old trick.
sentences.cn: 只有轻信他人的人才会上了他的当.

sentences.en: Only the most credulous Apple fans will be holding their breaths.
sentences.cn: 只有那些最盲目迷信的苹果爱好者才会摒息期待.

sentences.en: Quinn charmed credulous investors out of millions of dollars.
sentences.cn: 奎因花言巧语从轻信的投资者那里骗取了数百万美元。

sentences.en: So credulous he believes everything he reads.
sentences.cn: 他太轻信了,相信他读的所有内容.

sentences.en: The credulous investors believed in every word the analysts said.
sentences.cn: 轻信别人的投资者完全相信分析员所说的一切.

sentences.en: The manager of the bank credulous individual named Mr.
sentences.cn: 银行经理称“鱼先生,”是个轻信的人.

sentences.en: They are credulous people who believe in the advertisement.
sentences.cn: 他们是一些轻信广告的人.

sentences.en: We are less credulous than we used to be.
sentences.cn: 我们不再像以往那样轻易相信别人了.

sentences.en: You must be credulous if she fooled you with that story.
sentences.cn: 连她那种话都能把你骗倒,你一定是太容易相信别人了.

trans.tran_en: always believing what you are told, and therefore easily deceived
